heading: Congratulations!
desc: CMW received Rogers Oktoberfest Women of the Year Award in 'Group Achievement' category on October 7​th​, 2019

heading: Quebec Mosque’s shooting memorial event
desc: CMW will be organizing a community forum educational forum on Bill 21 and its impact in late Januray. Stay tuned for details!

heading: Annual General Meeting 2020
desc:
Saturday, February 22​nd​, 11 am to 1:30 pm
The Family Centre, 65 Hanson Avenue, Kitchener (Room #2015)
CMW's 2019 activities and financial report
Overview of 2020 business plan
Board elections for 2020-2023 term
Members will be able to pay their membership fee ($20 / year)
Brunch and childcare will be provided.
Please contact Uzma at uzma.bhutto@cmw-kw.org for childcare requests.
To RSVP: ​https://www.facebook.com/events/567863860672096/

heading: 10​th​ Anniversary Gala and Women Who Inspire Awards Night 2020
desc:
Saturday, April 16, 2020 (between 5pm and 9 pm) @ RIM Park
CMW’s 10​th​ Anniversary Gala and Awards Night will be a celebration of ​Muslim Women Making Change! ​in Waterloo Region through advocacy, activism, dialogue and bridge building. ​It will be an opportunity to reminisce with friends and colleagues, reflect on CMW’s incredible journey, and recognize and celebrate many accomplished Muslim women in Waterloo Region. We will be acknowledging the outstanding women who have made KW a wonderful place to live through their leadership, community service, activism, volunteerism, professional excellence and artistic accomplishments. Five and Ten Year Service Awards will be presented to CMW’s dedicated volunteers.Stay tuned for more information!
